title: GitHub
content:
Set Credential Data
```
git config --global user.name "unifino"
git config --global user.email "unifino@protonmail.com"
```
or on repo folder
```
git config user.email "unifino@protonmail.com"
git config user.name "unifino"
```

<hr>

Create a new repository
```
git init
git add .
git commit -m "first commit"
git branch -M main
git remote add origin https://github.com/unifino/project_002.git
```
```
git push -u origin main
```

<hr>

Push an existing repository
```
git remote add origin https://github.com/unifino/project_002.git
git branch -M main
git push -u origin main
```

<hr>

```
git config --global --edit

```

<hr>


Undo Commit:
```
git reset --hard xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
git push --force
```

<hr>

New Method Of Connection:
```
cd ~/Documents/Notes/ && git remote set-url origin https://unifino:[...TOCKEN...]@github.com/unifino/Notes.git
cd ~/Documents/Dora/DoraApp && git remote set-url origin https://unifino:[...TOCKEN...]k@github.com/unifino/Dora.git 
cd ~/Documents/Moshaf/MoshafWatch && git remote set-url origin https://unifino:[...TOCKEN...]k@github.com/unifino/MoshafWatch.git  
cd ~/Documents/Moshaf/MocshafServer && git remote set-url origin https://unifino:[...TOCKEN...]k@github.com/unifino/MoshafServer.git
cd ~/Documents/Moshaf/MoshafAssist && git remote set-url origin https://unifino:[...TOCKEN...]k@github.com/unifino/MoshafAssist.git
cd ~/Documents/Moshaf/MoshafApp && git remote set-url origin https://unifino:[...TOCKEN...]k@github.com/unifino/MoshafApp.git 

```
